sentences.en: Before me stretched the portentous, menacing road of a new decade.
sentences.cn: 在我面前展现出一条新的十年的凶多吉少 、 咄咄逼人的道路.

sentences.en: But the old man quietly faced the menacing populace.
sentences.cn: 只见老人面对着杀气腾腾的群众,神色从容.

sentences.en: Each time I moved in her direction, a menacing growl rumbled in her throat.
sentences.cn: 我每次朝她那方向走, 她喉咙里就响起威胁的咆哮声.

sentences.en: He moved his menacing bulk closer to the table.
sentences.cn: 他把自己骇人的庞大身躯向桌子挪近了些。

sentences.en: His voice was quiet and almost menacing.
sentences.cn: 他语气平静,带有些许威胁的口吻.

sentences.en: Menacing: If every night all molar teeth necessarily a problem.
sentences.cn: 磨牙: 如果每天晚上都磨牙,牙齿一定出了问题.

sentences.en: She had a slightly menacing manner.
The earth, the sun, the rain, the wind . All menacing, all helping.
sentences.cn: 大地 、 阳光 、 雨水和风儿,它们是那么仁慈, 那么乐于相助.

sentences.en: The elderly white - haired officer had the gnarled and menacing brow and blazing, powerful eyes.
sentences.cn: 这位白发军官双目炯炯有神, 眉宇间露出一副执拗的凶相.

sentences.en: The most menacing problem, Ethiopia's rapidly growing population, is almost never discussed.
sentences.cn: 但最具威胁性的是, 即埃塞俄比亚迅速膨胀的人口问题, 几乎从未涉及到.

sentences.en: The old man brandished his walking stick at the menacing dog.
sentences.cn: 老人对着那条要咬他的狗挥舞手杖吓它走.

sentences.en: The strong dark eyebrows give his face an oddly menacing look.
sentences.cn: 两道浓黑的眉毛使他的脸看起来异常凶狠。

sentences.en: The wide river looked less menacing when flanked by the warm yellow houses.
sentences.cn: 在两岸暖黄色房子的映衬下，这宽阔的大河看起来就不那么险恶了。

sentences.en: To some, the large - scale facility suggested a menacing ambition.
sentences.cn: 对一些人来说, 这种大规模的设施意味着极大的野心.

sentences.en: Your vicious dog is menacing my cat!
sentences.cn: 你那条恶狗对我家的猫太凶了.
